BrownTogether Campaign
An aspirational strategic plan to elevate the University to the highest level of excellence in our history deserved an equally aspirational campaign. In BrownTogether, we got it.





















  BrownTogether campaign extended


  With its new $4 billion goal, the campaign will continue through 2024—raising funds for research and teaching in medicine, public health, engineering and the arts, as well as student financial aid, career services and Brown Athletics.



READ THE FULL STORY



















More than ever, the world needs the full measure of Brown: its distinctive blend of courageous thinking, collaborative scholarship and commitment to the common good. 
BrownTogether, the comprehensive $4 billion fundraising campaign, is helping the University build on its distinction through critical investments in:
Our People. The diverse community of scholars—faculty, graduate students, and undergraduates—united in the pursuit of new knowledge and a commitment to improving lives.
Education and Research. Programs focused on examining big questions and finding solutions to global problems by working across academic boundaries.
Campus and Community. A place where our students and faculty can drive innovation and where openness and collaboration are supported and seen as critical to success.
The Brown Annual Fund. Immediate-use funds that allow for strategic deployment of resources—where and when they are most needed—and enhanced capacity to address emerging opportunities.

With your help, Brown will be perfectly positioned to transcend this century's challenges. Now—and in the years to come. Together, we are Brown.





  Campaign Progress







Our People
Untapped Potential / Unlimited Possibilities
Exceptional teaching. Distinguished scholarship. Collaborative research. One of the world’s most distinctive experiences for undergraduate, graduate and medical students: The people of Brown—talented, thoughtful individuals of intellectual rigor, generous spirit, and varied perspectives—define all that Brown is and can be. 
Together, we are strengthening their work by: 
Building and sustaining a world-class faculty composed of leading scholars who are also inspirational teachers. 
Expanding opportunity and access through a more generous financial aid program for low- and middle-income students and families that supports our commitment to meet the full demonstrated financial aid need for all undergraduates.
Creating a diverse and inclusive community capable of addressing the critical opportunities and issues of our time.
 
Education and Research
Empowering Collaboration / Advancing Knowledge
Health disparities and improving population health. Climate change. Racial injustice and income inequality. Complexities of human behavior. Social implications of technology: Through education and collaborative research, we tackle the complex questions and challenges of the 21st century: 
Together, we are building on our strengths and positioning Brown for even greater leadership by: 
Focusing on nine areas of inquiry—such as deciphering disease; creating peaceful, just, and prosperous societies; and cultivating creative expression—that require multidisciplinary perspectives.

	Fostering collaborative and life-changing research in brain science, economics, public health, sustainability, and computer science.

Funding educational enhancements to our signature Open Curriculum, including the creation of the Brown Teaching Fellows Programs and an Engaged Scholars program.
Linking students and alumni through internships and mentoring opportunities.
 
Campus and Community
Evolving Campus / Inspiring Community
Labs. Libraries. Athletics venues. Gathering spaces: Brown’s campus encourages innovation and reflects our defining values of excellence, openness, collaboration, and sustainability.
Together, we are changing the landscape of our University by:
Renovating heritage properties to accommodate the needs of our 21st-century learning community. 
Constructing new academic, research, and performance facilities. 
Building and improving team facilities and playing fields that enable our student-athletes to compete at the highest level.
Seeking a full array of programs to support our students—including first-generation and international students.
 
Annual Fund
Today's Vision / Tomorrow's Promise
Academic excellence. Educational Access. Service to society and making a difference in the world. These are Brown’s values, and Brunonians express their commitment to sustaining these values by giving immediate-use gifts through the Brown Annual Fund’s family of funds.
Together, we are ensuring a bright future by:
Sustaining financial aid and graduate student support—and giving the University the ability to nimbly respond to critical emerging needs—through The Brown Fund. 
Providing essential resources and enhancing the student-athlete experience through the Brown Athletics Annual Fund.
Supporting the individual goals of the School of Engineering, the School of Public Health, and The Warren Alpert Medical School through the professional school annual funds.
Investing in high-priority University initiatives like diversity and inclusion and campus sustainability through various impact funds.

  Together We Are Brown

 
  Brown University is in the midst of a $4B comprehensive campaign that is energizing its community and creating a lasting impact across the campus.









Want to know more about what BrownTogether helps makes possible? Discover the schools, centers, programs, and focus areas we're supporting—and learn how you can help.

124 and counting: Brown surpasses campaign faculty milestone





 December 9, 2022

  Through generous gifts to the BrownTogether campaign, donors have established 124 endowed faculty chairs to expand both inspired teaching and research in service to society.

Q&A with President Paxson: Reflecting on 10 years in the Brown presidency





July 6, 2022
  Appointed Brown’s 19th president in 2012, Christina H. Paxson has guided the University through major accomplishments and national moments of challenge, and she looks forward to achieving more in the years to come.
